attributes.action: stop Britian for catering for the worst teenagers in Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems to be the right time to stand up about this. Just this week a girl has lost her daddy because he stood up to teenage thugs damaging his property. According to some reports they were drunk - yes, our country is the only in Europe where it's cool to be drunk as a teenager. Even some start as young as 7/8. Innocent people are becoming the victims of many crimes due to teenagers walking round in packs and some are afraid to leave there house. Prime Minister, you think you are doing enough but clearly there is a big problem that needs tackling.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
